item.title: Advanced Programming for the Android Platform Using Java
item.description: We are planning a new training course Advanced Programming for the Android Platform Using Java. This will be an evening or weekend course.

item.title: Mobile Development using Android and Java
item.description: We are starting a new training course Mobile Development using Android and Java on October 31, 2011. This will be a 12 week full-time course.

item.title: Evenings only Software Testing (Software QA) Course
item.description: We are starting a training course in Software Testing on September 27, 2011. This will be an evenings only course held from 6 pm to 9 pm. There will be 6 sessions. Completion of the ISTQB Foundation Level Certification exam is included in the course, as an additional session of the course.

item.title: Work days only Software Testing (Software QA) Course
item.description: We are starting a training course in Software Testing on October 31, 2011. This will be a full-time course held daily for two weeks.

item.title: Evenings only Software Testing (Software QA) Course
item.description: We are starting a training course in Software Testing on September 6, 2011. This will be a part-time course held in the evening from 6 pm to 9 pm. There will be 15 sessions. Completion of the ISTQB Foundation Level Certification exam is included in the course.

item.title: Software Testing
item.description: We are planning to start a Software Testing course in the near future.

item.title: Internet Application Development with PHP, MySQL and AJAX
item.description: We are planning to start a hands-on training course in PHP, MySQL and AJAX very soon.

item.title: New starting date for Internet Application Development with Java EE, MySQL and AJAX
item.description: The starting date for this course is now July 18, 2011.

item.title: New course starting July 4, 2011
item.description: The DEEDS Project will be starting a new course in July 2011.
